SELECT on_no_sq.nextval FROM dual
insert into product_detail(on_no, pro_code, userid, on_count, hit, shareaddr, sharedetail, rest_count) values(on_no_sq.nextval, #{pro_code}, #{userid}, #{on_count}, 0, #{shareaddr}, #{sharedetail}, #{rest_count})
insert into order09(ord_no, pro_code, userid, ord_count, status, on_no) values(ord_no_sq.nextval, #{pro_code}, #{userid}, #{ord_count}, 1, #{on_no})
mapper.select: select r.username, r.tel, r.email, r.zipcode, r.addr, r.addrdetail, r.rank, o.userid, o.pro_code, o.pro_name, o.pro_price, o.image, o.pro_total, o.ord_no, o.ord_count, o.status, o.on_no from registerinfo r join (select p.pro_code, p.pro_name, p.pro_price, p.image, p.pro_total, o.ord_no, o.userid, o.ord_count, o.status, o.on_no from order09 o join product p on o.pro_code=p.pro_code and o.pro_code=#{pro_code}) o on r.userid=o.userid and o.userid=#{userid}
